SubModule_Description: To use the Light Matrix module add the following import statement to your project:

Function.Function_Description: Switches off all of the pixels on the Light Matrix.

Python_Code.Python_Code:
from hub import light_matrix
import time
# Update pixels to show an image on Light Matrix, and then turn them off using the clear function 

# Show a small heart 
light_matrix.show_image(2)

# Wait for two seconds 
time.sleep_ms(2000)

# Switch off the heart 
light_matrix.clear()
Python_Code.Python_Description: Switches off all of the pixels on the Light Matrix.
